Title: Chaos Machine
Book Description: The Chaos machine returns to shape your wildest engineering imagination into a functioning beacon of collective brilliance. Find some old friends or new acquaintances to help build the machine from the ground up!

Title: Free Fates Fortune Telling Booth
Book Description: Find a token- bring it to the booth in the lobby- and randomly generated predictions will be given to you! You may also write a short question and receive a Yes or No answer in return. Hours of operation posted at the booth.

Title: Giant Jenga
Book Description: Stop by and play some (enormous) Jenga with your friends- or meet new people. No writing dirty things on the blocks! You'll just have to use your imagination.

Title: Pengicon Picture Bingo
Book Description: Snap a picture of each clue and you will be rewarded! Go to Registration- Ops- or the Greeter table to get started!

Title: Retro-style Video Games
Book Description: Find David Gazdowicz's awesome games in the lobby... and play them!

Title: Where in the World?
Book Description: Wondering where people are coming from to go to Penguicon? Stop by and tag the city you came from on the World- US or Michigan map!

Title: Scavenger Hunt
Book Description: Go on a fun hunt around the con! The first 25 people to complete the tasks will win a 3D printed object! Other prizes too! To begin- find Mat in the Maker Market between 1 and 6 pm on Saturday

Title: Opening Up Retro-Style Video Cabinets
Book Description: David Gazdowicz created modern retro-style video games from the ground up. Join David in the lobby as he opens up the cabinets so you can poke around a bit at the inner workings!

Title: The World Around You Is Not What It Seemsâ€¦
Book Description: A WAR is being fought right HERE right NOW. The fate of all humanity is in your hands. You look up from your phone: is that guy on the corner just walking his dog- or is he an Ingress Agent from the other side about to attack your neighborhood? Meet at Lawrence University courtyard to learn new skills and gain experience playing ingress for your faction. If you want to carpool- meet at the fountain in the lobby at 4:45. If you drive over- meet at Ockham's Wedge sculpture in the enter of the quad area near the Taubman Student Services Center at 5:00.
